summary:
I have cheated some characters for your use.. they have all skills 100 and all perks ingame.
they have most of the shouts and a good source of spells..
descriptionHtml:
Readme for Save Pack Ultra Cheat!

UPDATE: Fixed the issue where all saves had less than 100 in skills.. and now you are lvl 108 on top of that ;)

Description.

I have cheated some characters for your use.. they have all skills 100 and all perks ingame.
they have most of the shouts and a good source of spells..

they are saved inside of Breezehome in Whiterun.. they have alot of crafting materials, weapons and armor

NOTE: they are all carrying abit to much so just dump some gear into the chests of your home if you dont want it.

These are for fun use and most likley will be overpowered.. maybe your bored or would just like to have a good
character for Skyrim-Online or something like that.. well heres the treat..

If you dont like the looks and want your own style.. simply type: ShowRaceMenu in your console and make your own look.

Installation

Simply dump them in your Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves.
author: Marghwl
